Name: The Inn at Grace Winery
Description: Country-style rooms & cottages on a 50-acre estate & winery, plus a seasonal outdoor pool.

Name: The Inn at Swarthmore
Description: Warm rooms in an understated hotel offering a casual restaurant/bar, plus a 24-hour gym.

Name: SureStay Plus by Best Western Brandywine Valley
Description: Warm quarters, some with whirlpool tubs, in a relaxed property offering a 24-hour gym & a pool.

Name: The Dwight D Hotel
Description: Boutique hotel in an 1840s townhouse, offering elegant rooms with free WiFi, plus dining & a garden.

Name: General Warren
Description: Traditional, old-world American eatery with a terrace & fireplace inside a historic boutique hotel.

Name: Wayne Hotel
Description: Landmark hotel with classic rooms featuring free WiFi, continental breakfast & off-site gym access.

Name: The Inn at Montchanin Village & Spa - A Historic Hotel of America
Description: Secluded, restored 19th-century village offering rooms & suites in refurbished workers' cottages.

Name: Manayunk Chambers Guest House and QUARTERS
Description: Warm B&B offering individually decorated rooms with fireplaces, plus free drinks & Wi-Fi.

Name: HOTEL DU PONT
Description: Landmark 1900s hotel featuring refined rooms & suites, plus a fine-dining restaurant, a bar & a spa.

Name: Inn At The Union League
Description: Elegant guest rooms & suites with free breakfast & gym access are offered at The Union League.

Name: Philadelphia Hotel Bella Vista
Description: Quirky rooms & suites with antique furnishings, plus a garden & Wi-Fi.

Name: The Franklin on Rittenhouse, A Boutique Hotel
Description: Victorian mansion with elegant decor & marble bathrooms, plus free Wi-Fi & continental breakfast.

Name: SpringHill Suites Philadelphia Airport/Ridley Park
Description: Relaxed all-suite hotel with a free airport shuttle & breakfast, plus an indoor pool & 24/7 store.

Name: Four Seasons Hotel Philadelphia at Comcast Center
Description: Luxury hotel offering stylish rooms & suites, plus a spa with an indoor pool & a sleek restaurant.

Name: Aloft Philadelphia Airport
Description: Sleek airport hotel offering a stylish bar, a gym & an indoor pool, plus a free airport shuttle.

Name: Delta Hotel Philadelphia Airport
Description: Relaxed hotel with a cozy restaurant, plus a bar, a fitness room & a free airport shuttle.

Name: Alexander Inn
Description: Art deco-style hotel offering relaxed rooms with minifridges, plus all-day snacks & breakfast.
